descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...a single red colored pixel in one of the column
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...copy and paste the input grid size
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...make the pixels touching the colored pixel at its corners colored in green for the top left corner pixel, pink for the pixel touching its top right corner, light blue for the pixel touching its bottom left corner and orange for the pixel touching its bottom right corner. the colored pixel in the input should be colored black

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...a single red colored pixel in one of the column
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...copy and paste the input grid size
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...make the pixels touching the colored pixel at its corners colored in green for the top left corner pixel, pink for the pixel touching its top right corner, light blue for the pixel touching its bottom left corner and orange for the pixel touching its bottom right corner. the colored pixel in the input should be colored black

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...one red cell
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size... is the same
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...left up diagonal green. right up diagonal pink. left down diagonal blue. Right down diagonal orange

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...red square good
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...not change grid
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...bottom right red square

descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...not change grid
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...bottom right red square

descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...bottom right red square

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...a red block on an entire black background
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...should have 1, 2, or 4 boxes that are green, pink, light blue or orange. The grid stays the same size between.
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...depending on which you have, everything else is black but these colors.-Column 1 has a green on 1 and light blue on 3. Column 2 is all black. Column 2 has pink on 1 and orange on 3.-A single green in the middle of column 4.-Column 3 has a green on 1 and light blue on 3. Column 2 is all black. Column 3 has pink on 1 and orange on 3.-Two spots (light blue and orange) in the middle of column 2 and 5.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...a red square on a black background
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...does not change
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...on the grid where the red square is, place a green square to the top left of it, a pink square to the top right of it, a light blue square to the bottom left of it, an orange square to the bottom right of it, and leave out the red square
